name: Unexpected End
description:
Unexpected End is a first person view resolution and entertainment game based on room escape genre.

Story

You pick up the consciousness in the driver's seat of a jeep in the garage of a house. The blow prevents you from remembering what has happened so you venture into an unknown house to ask for help.

Mechanics



You will have to find, grab, combine and make use of multiple objects in order to resolve different situations as well as to advance in the story by gradually discovering information about the house owners and what happened.

Each action / decision that you take, will affect your destiny, approaching you more and more to one of the 4 available endings that there is for now. So, "think twice and choose wisely."
